automations.title: Automations
automations.noAutomationsDescription: Create your first automation to get started with automating your business workflows.

createDialog.title: Create automation
createDialog.description: Pick a ready-to-use template or describe your idea to the AI assistant.

templates.title: Recommended templates
templates.subtitle: Every template runs inside the EU, respects your existing connections and stays GDPR compliant.

invoiceToSheet.title: Store invoices in spreadsheets automatically
invoiceToSheet.description: Scans new Gmail invoices, extracts totals and appends them to Google Sheets.
invoiceToSheet.gdpr: Invoice data stays encrypted inside CertusFlow.

contractAlerts.title: Contract renewal alerts
contractAlerts.description: Monitors Dropbox/Drive folders and schedules reminders before contracts expire.
contractAlerts.gdpr: Only metadata (file name, due date) is processed.

supportEscalation.title: Support escalation
supportEscalation.description: Analyzes Slack or email tickets and flags critical cases instantly.
supportEscalation.gdpr: Conversation content never leaves your workspace.

dailyDigest.title: Daily KPI digest
dailyDigest.description: Collects key metrics from connected tools and sends a morning report.
dailyDigest.gdpr: Only aggregated numbers are shared, never raw data.

ai.title: Need something else?
ai.subtitle: Describe your automation in plain language. The AI only uses the data and connections you've already approved.
ai.placeholder: e.g. "When a new Dropbox file is added to Contracts, create a Notion task"
ai.helper: Please avoid sensitive personal or health data. Your description is encrypted and deleted after processing.
ai.gdpr: The prompt is only processed to generate this suggestion and is not stored.

toast.templateReady: Template prepared. You can customise it now.
toast.aiReady: AI suggestion created. Review it before activating.

contractScanner.title: Contract Scanner
contractScanner.description: Control retention, default deletion and anonymization for analyzed contracts.

contractScanner.deletionHint: This preset is shown inside the scanner.
contractScanner.anonymizationDescription: Personal data is redacted right after the analysis while originals stay untouched.

twoFactorSetup.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorSetup.description: Protect your account with an additional security code from your authenticator app.
twoFactorSetup.statusDisabledDesc: Your account is not protected by 2FA.
twoFactorSetup.activeInfoDesc: A code from your authenticator app is required for every sign-in.
twoFactorSetup.scanQRDesc: Scan this code with your authenticator app.
twoFactorSetup.scanInstructions: Scan the QR code with an app like Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, or any other TOTP-compatible app.
twoFactorSetup.manualEntry: Alternatively, you can enter the code manually.
twoFactorSetup.verifyCodeDesc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to enable 2FA.
twoFactorSetup.enterCode: Enter the current code from your app.
twoFactorSetup.backupCodesDesc: Save these codes securely. You can use them if you don't have access to your authenticator app.
twoFactorSetup.warningDesc: Each code can only be used once. Store them in a secure location.
twoFactorSetup.disableDesc: To disable 2FA, enter a code from your authenticator app.
twoFactorSetup.disableWarning: Warning: Your account will be less secure without 2FA.
twoFactorSetup.enterCodeToDisable: Enter the current code to continue.
